aboutpara: A newly trained MERN stack engineer, I bring a diverse skill set to the table, having previously run a successful printing business and worked in retail. My background in Architectural Technology has also equipped me with a strong foundation in CAD. As a MERN stack engineer, I have developed expertise in building dynamic, scalable web applications using MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, and NodeJS. I am adept at writing clean, efficient, and well-documented code, and I am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices in web development.
